localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Pexels gives you unlimited access to over 3 million free, high-resolution photos and videos – now available at your fingertips anywhere you go with a newly re-designed app.
blogPost.body: Pexels gives you unlimited access to over 3 million free, high-resolution photos and videos – now available at your fingertips anywhere you go with a newly re-designed app.
blogPost.title: Pexels App 2.0 - 3M+ completely free photos and videos in one app
blogPost.author: Bruno Joseph

localize.description: Pexels 让您可以无限制地访问超过 300 万张免费的高分辨率照片和视频--现在您可以通过全新设计的应用程序随时随地获取。
localize.tagline: 3M+完全免费的照片和视频在一个应用程序中。

localize.description: Pexels 讓您可以無限制地訪問超過 300 萬張免費的高分辨率照片和視頻--現在您可以通過全新設計的應用程序隨時隨地獲取。
localize.tagline: 3M+完全免費的照片和視頻在一個應用程序中。

previous.excerpt: The next time you are with your co-founder or potential partner, get to know them better by taking turns answering questions from this deck of co-founder cards... Learn more about each other so you can work better both together and individually.
previous.title: Co-founder Question Cards - Questions to ask your co-founder to know each other better.

localize.description: 下次你和你的联合创始人或潜在的合作伙伴在一起的时候，可以通过轮流回答这副联合创始人牌中的问题来更好地了解他们...... 更多地了解对方，这样你们才能更好地合作和单独工作。
localize.tagline: 问你的联合创始人一些问题，以便更好地了解对方。

localize.description: 下次你和你的聯合創始人或潛在的合作伙伴在一起的時候，可以通過輪流回答這副聯合創始人牌中的問題來更好地瞭解他們...... 更多地瞭解對方，這樣你們才能更好地合作和單獨工作。
localize.tagline: 問你的聯合創始人一些問題，以便更好地瞭解對方。

next.title:
Warren Buffett has a net worth of $90 billion.

100% of that came after his seventh birthday.

localize.full_text:
巴菲特的净资产为900亿美元。

100%是在他七岁生日之后。

巴菲特的淨資產爲900億美元。

100%是在他七歲生日之後。
